Description: Saudi Fisheries Co (known as: SFICO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. SFICO operates within the Food, Beverage and Tobacco sector focusing on Packaged Foods and Meats. SFICO is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in March 1980
